title: What are some of most important disadvantages of echo? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alexa limitations can be found in certain categories Sound quality - directly comparing the echo’s sound quality compared with other high quality speakers falls short, that being said the frictionless use of voice makes an improved experience. Complex tasks - Alexa currently cannot process complex commands such as `Alexa play U2 and order me an Uber` it lacks the ability to handle multiple commands or complex context based skills Cost - There is a prohibitive cost factor of selling a $150-$180/unit
